nodes.bodyText: This is added intentionally to replace it with "on" string.
format is now not consistent with the one above
Yes. it's different for each frequency but the same as Android. It was finalized by the BA team and got the approval.

add a space before a in all format strings.
Remove space before ;, , and add a single space after.

This is the output which is an approved change and already tested by QA.
Adding space will make it inconsistent with Android.
